title: ↪ 📱 Stunning Fully Furnished 3 Bedroom 3/2.5 EDGEWATER: Furnished Excellenc
posting_body: ['REF# 10R128', '$7500 · 3/2.5 · Icon Bay Condo · 1395 Sqft · Edgewater · Furnished', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'Stunning fully furnished 3 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath corner Unit At Icon Bay with spectacular City and Bay views.', 'For Rent for 6 months.', 'Available July 17th.', 'Decorated with top of the line furniture, floor to ceiling windows, roller blinds/blackouts in bedrooms, custom walk-in closets and private elevator.', 'Possibility to convert nursery room into an office room or queen bed room.', 'The building offers resort style amenities including infinity pool, 2 Tennis Courts, Gym, Spa, Party Room and a sky lobby with an entertainment area including a movie and a pool table.', 'Edgewater is a very central neighborhoood just 5 to 10 minutes drive to Miami Design District, Midtown Shops, Wynwood, Brickell and Miami Beach.', 'Read Less', 'REF# 10R128', 'tags:', "500 brickell, 1010 brickell, bay crest homes, 1010 brickell, bay crest homes, brickell roads, brand new, bay point homes, belle meade homes, axis on brickell north, brickell park condo, l'hermitage, cite condo, st. louis condo, 500 brickell, venetia condo, brickell heights, skyline on brickell, 1080 brickell, nordica condo, axis on brickell south, 50 biscayne, brickells flagler homes, paraiso bay condo, the palace, icon brickell, bay house, opera tower, ios on the bay, brickell place, the ivy, nine at mary brickell village,, 1060 brickell, wynwood lofts", '_mr10']
